page.title: 09 Shipton post office
page.content: In 1982 Mr and Mrs Goffee came back from Zambia,Africa and decided to work in a post office.They have an assistant Mrs Barley. They collect their food stuffs from Linfood and also cash'n'carry.Mrs Goffee works in the shop and Mr Goffee in the post office.Thursday is the busiest day for the post office and shop.The opening times are:Monday 6:00-1:00 2:00-5:30 Tuesday " " " " " " " " Wednesday " " " " closed Thursday " " " " 2:00-5:30 Friday " " " " " " " " Saturday 6:00-12:30 closed Sunday closed The post office opens at 9:00 everyday except Sunday.The Goffee's try to keep almost everything in stock because the shop is the only one in the village. The nearest shops are in York & Haxby. That is about 4-5 miles away.
